<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Combat Grab](/Feats.aspx?ID=4780) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=127) (Level 4), [Zombie](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=182) (Level 4), [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=270) (Level 4)

**Requirements**
You have one hand free, and your target is within reach of that hand

</column>

---

Using your prior attack to shift your opponent’s guard, you take another swing and grab them. Make a melee Strike while keeping one hand free. If the Strike hits, you grab the target using your free hand. The creature remains grabbed until the end of your next turn or until it Escapes, whichever comes first.
name: Combat Grab
requirement: You have one hand free, and your target is within reach of that hand
